about_the_game:
Nova Era: Atom
🌌 Explore the Boundless Multiverse

Nova Era: Atom, a groundbreaking sci-fi MMORPG meticulously crafted by passionate players. Venture into an endless, diverse universe where you'll embark on unparalleled adventures and face thrilling challenges. Unveil the mysteries of interstellar realms and experience the marvels of genetic evolution.

🧬 Evolution Unleashed with Diverse Species
Dive into the captivating world of evolution. Gather rare resources to upgrade your character, enhance your spacecraft and mechs, and unlock extraordinary skills and abilities. Your journey to transcendence through a unique evolutionary path is yours to command.

🌍 Unite with Distinctive Races
Choose from an array of unique races, each boasting its own civilization and special abilities. Align with your preferred race, join forces with allies from other races, form an invincible fleet, and create exclusive strongholds to defend against unknown civilizations.

🎮 Immersive PC-Quality Experience
Immerse yourself in a game that excels in visuals, sound, and design. With detailed 3D modeling, captivating ambient sounds, and stunning futuristic environments, Star Epoch: Proto-Core rekindles the original excitement of PC gaming.

🔄 Craft Your Second Life
Liberate yourself from reality's constraints and forge a new destiny. Whether you become an interstellar explorer, a cosmic conqueror, or cultivate your own space garden, you can choose your future in this expansive universe. This is your chance to live a second life.

🌟 Join Nova Era: Atom now and embark on your sci-fi odyssey! In this vast multiverse, you'll write your own legendary tale.

short_description: Welcome to the first trailer of Nova Era: Atom, Welcome to Nova Era: Atom, a sci-fi MMORPG game blending Chinese mythology. where you can DIY your own custom spaceship and explore the endless mysteries of the cosmos.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese*, Polish, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support
